mconference.name: Oasis Spa Point
mconference.details: Oasis Spa Point is a newly established state-of-the-art pampering point in the heart of Nairobi's Kilimani area. Located at a serene and quiet neighborhood, the ambience is HIP, MELLOW and UNPRETENTIOUS.

item.name: Stone Therapy
item.desc: Heated,smooth stones are placed on certain points on the body to warm and loosen tight muscles and balance energy centers. KSH:2,500 P.P

item.name: Thigh Therapy
item.desc: Detoxifying clays pulls toxins from deep within the skin as pure cane sugar sloughs expired cells to reveal.

item.name: G-8 Massage Therapy
item.desc: Discover the new technological advantages of the G8 Massage Therapy System! Exclusive electro-massage features include exclusive gyrating applicator heads for multiple beauty treatments and services. .
